title: Primitive
text:
Primitive
Primitive(
    self: None
    f: Callable
    name: str
    output: Sequence[str]
    forward_unused: bool = False
    splice_on_call: bool = True
)
Primitive function wrapper.
Forces all arguments to be keyword arguments and forces the wrapped function to return a dictionary. Furthermore, any arguments that are not specified in the signature of the wrapped function are optionally passed directly into the output.
